=======
 PyHsm 
=======

PyHsm is a hierarchical state machines library designed for
very large hand written state machines.

PyHsm is designed to be concise, i.e. let the user write little and 
do a lot, esecially for hierarchical finite 
state machines definition.

It's designed for *very large hand written state machines*

See http://www.pyhsm.org/tutorial.html for an introduction.

Enjoy,
